name: Webgility
tag_list: ecommerce, quickbooks-sync, intuit-gold-partner, magento-quickbooks-sync, shipping-integration, inventory-management, order-management
overview:
Webgility is a software company that develops QuickBooks Integration solutions for small and medium sized eCommerce businesses.

In 2007, Webgility was founded with the simple idea of building an application to eliminate redundant data entry for online sellers using QuickBooks. Today, Webgility is an Intuit Gold-certified company. Its flagship product, eCommerceConnector (eCC), is a leading application for QuickBooks integration and order fulfillment. eCC integrates with over 20 of the most popular eCommerce platforms, all PC editions of QuickBooks, major shipping processors and payment gateways. A companion iPhone application to eCC, eCC Mobile integrates with eCommerce platforms so businesses can manage their online store on the go.

Headquartered in San Francisco, CA with a development and support center in Indore, India, Webgility has a team of 35 people and growing. The management team has over 15 years of technology and eCommerce experience, and has worked with a wide range of companies, from startups to large global corporations. Webgilityâ€™s seasoned engineering team uses the latest technologies and Agile development methodology to continuously deliver new product releases, while the knowledgeable customer service team provides round-the-clock support to thousands of customers across the U.S., Canada, the U.K., Australia and South Africa.
